title: (x) Futura-like 1950's geometric sans - Neutraface {Florian}
content:
Hello typophiles! This font has been appearing more frequently, and i just love it so much. I've been looking everywhere, but no site seems to have a match for it. It looks like Futura, exept that the median seems lowered a bit. Anyone know which this is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20101018231521im_/http:/typophile.com/files/angora_5131.png)
author: bjarkebech

comments.content:
Hi Bjarke,

that’s [Neutraface Display Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20101018231521/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=615&subpage=neutra_view_all_fonts) by [House Industries](http://web.archive.org/web/20101018231521/http:/typophile.com/wiki/House%2520Industries).  
F
Ahh, Thanks so much Florian! Can't wait to try it out!
